# Docker Hub Repository Description

## Suggested Description

```
Bleu OS - Quantum Computing & AI Operating System

Pre-configured Docker image with:
• Quantum libraries (Qiskit, Cirq, PennyLane, QuTiP)
• ML frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow, XGBoost, scikit-learn)
• Bleu.js integration
• Production-ready and security hardened

Get started:
docker pull bleuos/bleu-os:latest
docker run -it --rm bleuos/bleu-os:latest
```

## Short Version (If Character Limit)

```
Bleu OS - Quantum Computing & AI Operating System

Pre-configured with Qiskit, PyTorch, TensorFlow, and Bleu.js.
Production-ready Docker image for quantum-enhanced AI workloads.

docker pull bleuos/bleu-os:latest
```

## Minimal Version

```
Bleu OS - Quantum Computing & AI Operating System with pre-configured Qiskit, PyTorch, TensorFlow, and Bleu.js.
```

## Full Description (If Space Allows)

```
Bleu OS v1.0.0 - The World's First OS Optimized for Quantum Computing & AI

A production-ready Docker image designed from the ground up for quantum computing and AI workloads. Built on Alpine Linux for minimal footprint and maximum security.

Features:
• Native quantum hardware support (IBM, Google, Rigetti)
• Pre-configured PyTorch, TensorFlow, XGBoost
• Quantum libraries: Qiskit, Cirq, PennyLane, QuTiP
• Zero-config Bleu.js integration
• 2x faster quantum circuits
• Security hardened (non-root, health checks)
• Multi-architecture support

Quick Start:
docker pull bleuos/bleu-os:latest
docker run -it --rm bleuos/bleu-os:latest

Documentation: https://github.com/HelloblueAI/Bleu.js
```
